meanings.sent1: The freneticism of the children playing in the park was contagious.
meanings.sent2: The city buzzed with the freneticism of rush hour traffic.
meanings.sent3: The freneticism of the puppy chasing its tail was both amusing and endearing.
meanings.sent4: Her heart raced with the freneticism of a wild horse galloping across the plains.
meanings.sent5: The freneticism of the dance floor made it impossible to stand still.

meanings.sent1: His freneticism was evident in the way he rushed through tasks without pausing.
meanings.sent2: The freneticism of the storm matched his own inner turmoil.
meanings.sent3: Despite his freneticism, he somehow managed to stay organized and on schedule.
meanings.sent4: The freneticism of the busy marketplace mirrored the chaos in his mind.
meanings.sent5: In the freneticism of the moment, he made a split-second decision that changed everything.
